member.name: IOleContainer.EnumObjects
member.summary: Enumerates the objects in the current container.
member.param: Specifies which objects in a container are to be enumerated, as defined in the enumeration .

A pointer to an pointer variable that receives the interface pointer to the enumerator object. Each time a container receives a successful call to EnumObjects, it must increase the reference count on the ppenum pointer the method returns. It is the caller's responsibility to call when it is done with the pointer. If an error is returned, the implementation must set ppenum to NULL.

returns.para: This method returns S_OK on success. Other possible return values include the following.

member.name: IOleContainer.LockContainer
member.summary: Keeps the container for embedded objects running until explicitly released.
member.param: Indicates whether to lock (TRUE) or unlock (FALSE) a container.

returns.para: This method returns S_OK on success. Other possible return values include the following.

listheader.description: Insufficient memory available for the operation.

member.name: IOleContainer
member.summary: Enumerates objects in a compound document or lock a container in the running state. Container and object applications both implement this interface.
